title: Trial begins of Thai ex-PM Yingluck
desc: Former Thai PM Yingluck Shinawatra pleads not guilty as her negligence trial over a controversial rice subsidy scheme begins in Bangkok.

title: Afghan police jailed over mob death
desc: Eleven Afghan policemen are sentenced to one year in prison for failing to protect Farkhunda - woman beaten to death in Kabul.

title: 'Surge' in Egypt forces' sex attacks
desc: Egyptian security forces are using sexual violence against detainees on a massive scale, according to human rights campaigners.

title: Greek deal 'within the next week'

title: Colombia landslide kills dozens
desc: Dozens of people have been killed by a landslide in Antioquia province in north-western Colombia, officials say.

title: Cartoonist Luz leaves Charlie Hebdo
desc: Charlie Hebdo cartoonist Luz who designed its cover image of Muhammad after the Paris attacks announces he is leaving the magazine.
